str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Just as, as, even as. From hos and per; just as, i.e. Exactly like.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
